text: Geodia gallica is a species of sponge in the family Geodiidae. The species was first described by Lendenfeld in 1907. It is found in the coastal waters of Agulhas Bank, next to South Africa. == Bibliography == * Lendenfeld, R. von. (1907). « Die Tetraxonia. Wissenschaftliche Ergebnisse der Deutschen Tiefsee- Expedition auf der Dampfer Valdivia 1898-1899 ». 11(1-2): i-iv, 59-374, pls IX-XLVI. ==References== Category:Tetractinellida Category:Sponges described in 1907
title: Geodia gallica
